name: M3USize
short_description:
Determine the size and existence of all mp3 files referenced in an m3u playlist. 

A small application that will determine the exitstence and size of all mp3 files within an M3U playlist. The total size, and a quick indicator if any files are missing is also given. 

Wrote this quickly to make uploading music to my phone a bit easier. No plans to develop further, except adding command line argument functionality.

summary: Find mp3 files referenced in an m3u file
